nodes.documentation:
@title Atonomi Network Settings
 @notice This contract controls all owner configurable variables in the network

RegistrationFeeUpdated
ActivationFeeUpdated
DefaultReputationRewardUpdated
ReputationIRNNodeShareUpdated
RewardBlockThresholdChanged
